linux/drivers/mmc/host/mxc_mmc.h File Reference

Driver for the Freescale Semiconductor MXC SDHC modules. More...


Defines

#define SDHC_MMC_WML   16

Detailed Description

Driver for the Freescale Semiconductor MXC SDHC modules.

This file defines offsets and bits of SDHC registers. SDHC is also referred as MMC/SD controller

Define Documentation

#define SDHC_MMC_WML   16

Number of SDHC modules
